TopicTitle: What craft do people enjoy the most?

Articles.Content:
It's pretty simple, what craft do people like seeing breaking new "records in KSP?"

I understand that there is a limit to how fast a craft can be, how much a lifter can take to orbit, etc etc.

What records do you guys like seeing broken the most, and what types of craft are the most enjoyable to see improved upon? Replica's, new designs? Rockets? Aircraft? Rovers? etc etc
I think replica's photograph well, so if I was flipping through pictures that's what I'd want to see.

I would say land and watercraft speed records

Edited July 18, 2017 by Castille7

Whats the underwater speed record?

I like clean and well built craft of any description, I don't like ragged edges and misaligned plates, I understand that you can't get them perfect for every replica, and spaghetti knows I haven't always, but I am very much in the @Rune and @Cupcake... camp of appreciating aesthetics as high as performance.
Thanks for the information, I was just wondering what kind of aspects of craft were most well liked, and I see aesthetics seems to have as big if a fanbase as performance.
i think intricate new design crafts are popular
